ing: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans French-style green beans, drained
des: "For someone who likes to be in and out of the kitchen, this recipe lets me do just that and gives the illusion that it was a lot more work than it was. But I'm not telling!"
ins: In a large bowl, combine vinegar, oil, sugar, garlic powder, onion, green beans and bean sprouts.  Cover and marinate overnight in the refrigerator.
